name: The Cube Hotel（Ning's Wing 2）
description: This is a puzzle adventure game. It has a high degree of freedom like a sandbox game. There are 4 branches, 10 endings, nearly 50 rooms and 50 puzzles in this game. The fans of escape games should not miss the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0
